Package ch.ethz.vizzly.datatype

This package contains the implementations of data types that are used in Vizzly.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheConfiguration
    This class implements a simple data type for assigning a aggregation window length to a cache implementation
    CachedDataInfo
    This class implements a data type that describes the properties and contents of cached data.
    CacheSpec
    This class implements a data structure that represents a cache specification made in the XML configuration file of Vizzly.
    ServerSpec
    This class defines a data type that represents a server that listens on a TCP port.
    VizzlySignal
    This class implements a data type that represents a requested signal.
    VizzlySignal.DataSource
    This class implements a data type that represents a data source.
    VizzlySignal.DeviceSelect
    This class implements a data type that represents a device selection.
    VizzlySignalCurrentness
    This class implements a data type that is used for determining the next signal that is going to be updated by the cache updaters.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CachedDataInfo.SortParameter  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    VizzlyException
    This class implements an exception.
    VizzlyInvalidSignalException
    This class implements an exception data type that is used for signaling problems in a signal specification.

Package ch.ethz.vizzly.datatype Description

This package contains the implementations of data types that are used in Vizzly.
